main event: A civilian sighted a round, white light in the sky while driving along the highway on September 23, 1961.
interesting points: The object was initially stationary before accelerating rapidly and disappearing., Witnesses described the object as resembling a bright star in size., The sighting lasted for about 60 seconds., A separate account by a resident noted a round, grey object observed for 3-4 minutes., The objects observed did not exhibit the characteristics of meteors or conventional aircraft.
sighted object: a round, white light and a round, grey object
